A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It was a very good and risk taking movie. It was well written and had a very diverse cast giving Oscar winning performances. It was nice to see Carrie Fisher as Princess Leia for her final portal as the character and Mark Hamill returns as Luke Skywalker giving an equally great performance. It was all around a good movie and if you are a true Star Wars fan you will have an amazing time with this movie. I cant thank you Ryan Johnston and the casht enough for giving us such a quality film. May the force be with you all.\nSincerely\, Mark X Smith
